articles.title: Gal Gadot’s ‘Imagine’ Video Was The Beginning of the End - Vulture
articles.description: Perhaps it’s not a coincidence that, in the five years since Gal Gadot released her ‘Imagine’ video, disdain for celebrities — at least the traditional Hollywood class — has increased alongside a deep sense of nihilism.
